prompt: Design a luxurious wishlist page with a deep gold background and a black app bar with a gold heart icon and 'Wishlist' title in gold. Display wishlist items in a vertical list with cards that have a gold border and subtle shimmer effect. Each card should feature a product icon on the left, product name and price on the right, and a gold heart icon for removal on the right. Use a floating action button at the bottom right with a black accent for adding items. Ensure the layout is responsive with elegant typography and gold and black color accents.
